name: Azure Haven Boutique Hotel
shortDescription: Design-first stay in Lisbon’s creative quarter with sweeping rooftop views and curated city guides.
description: Azure Haven Boutique Hotel offers a calm oasis among Lisbon's buzzing Bairro Alto district. Inspired by coastal hues and mid-century touches, each suite includes Dyson amenities and a personalized Tripolio city itinerary.

name: Desert Dream Eco Retreat
shortDescription: Off-grid luxury domes with panoramic desert views, tailored for conscious travelers.
description: Desert Dream Eco Retreat blends architectural domes with regenerative hospitality. Enjoy zero-waste amenities, canyon yoga flows, and curated experiences from local Sedona guides.

name: Nordic Nest Lakeside Cabin
shortDescription: Minimalist A-frame cabins with Nordic spa access and front-row aurora shows.
description: Escape to geothermal-heated cabins framed by Iceland’s dramatic landscapes. Each stay includes access to an on-site sauna, private aurora alert system, and chef-led Arctic dining experiences.

name: Urban Oasis Loft Suites
shortDescription: Serene loft suites in Shibuya, designed for travelers who balance adventure and mindfulness.
description: Urban Oasis Loft Suites merge Japanese minimalism with smart hospitality. Guests enjoy guided tea ceremonies, co-working lounges, and curated itineraries through Tripolio’s city experts.

name: Vineyard Villa & Spa
shortDescription: Tuscan estate surrounded by vineyards, with chef-led experiences and wellness rituals.
description: The Vineyard Villa & Spa is a restored farmhouse artfully designed for immersive Tuscan stays. Enjoy sunrise vineyard meditations, Michelin-star dining, and private cellar tours curated by Tripolio.

name: Coastal Collective Surf House
shortDescription: Slow-travel surf house with community vibes, creative workshops, and oceanfront suites.
description: Coastal Collective Surf House is designed for travelers who crave intentional community. Wake up steps from Byron Bay’s best breaks, with daily programming curated by Tripolio beach hosts.

name: Skyline Retreat Residences
shortDescription: Glass-clad suites hovering above Manhattan with Tripolio concierge perks.
description: Skyline Retreat Residences offers expansive city views, private Peloton rooms, and chef-led dining experiences. Guests can sync Tripolio itineraries with in-room tablets for effortless city exploration.

name: Alpine Haven Chalet
shortDescription: Matterhorn-facing chalet with private funicular and Tripolio-guided glacier experiences.
description: Alpine Haven Chalet wraps modern alpine design with concierge-led adventures. Book via Tripolio to unlock guided glacier hikes, sommelier tastings, and late checkout for red-eye departures.

name: Desert Horizon Camp
shortDescription: Luxury desert domes with Bedouin-led adventures and Tripolio sustainability notes.
description: Desert Horizon Camp combines lunar-like landscapes with mindful hospitality. Guests booking via Tripolio receive curated sunrise balloon rides and a stargazing guide crafted by local astronomers.

name: Rainforest Cascade Villas
shortDescription: Waterfall-fed villas deep in the rainforest with naturalist-led excursions.
description: Rainforest Cascade Villas immerses guests in biodiverse jungle living. Tripolio travellers receive complimentary coffee farm tours, waterfall yoga, and bespoke wildlife itineraries.

name: Mediterranean Loft Collection
shortDescription: Design lofts in El Born with Tripolio-curated tapas nights and design tours.
description: Mediterranean Loft Collection blends Catalan design heritage with connected hospitality. Book via Tripolio for guided architecture walks, bike concierge service, and exclusive tapas workshops.

name: Sahara Star Dunes Camp
shortDescription: Berber-inspired desert camp with Tripolio-curated camel caravans and stargazing rituals.
description: Sahara Star Dunes Camp combines Marrakesh design touches with Bedouin hospitality. Tripolio travellers unlock private dune dining, star maps, and sustainable desert wellness treatments.

name: Andaman Horizon Overwater Villas
shortDescription: Floating villas in the Andaman Sea with Tripolio coral conservation programming.
description: Andaman Horizon pairs teak craftsmanship with regenerative marine tourism. Book via Tripolio to access reef restoration dives, private longtail cruises, and Thai culinary labs.

name: Andes Summit Lodge
shortDescription: High-altitude lodge with Tripolio-designed Sacred Valley routes and culinary labs.
description: Andes Summit Lodge fuses modern minimalism with Andean rituals. Tripolio itineraries include curated weaving villages, highland gastronomy, and priority Machu Picchu access.

name: Cape Winelands Manor
shortDescription: Cape Dutch manor with Tripolio-hosted wine safaris and artist residencies.
description: Cape Winelands Manor links modern tasting lounges with heritage vineyards. Tripolio guests receive private cellar tours, art studio access, and chef-led braai evenings.

name: Island Sky Pod Suites
shortDescription: Panoramic pods overlooking Lake Wakatipu with Tripolio adventure concierge.
description: Island Sky Pod Suites deliver alpine luxury with cinematic views. Tripolio-curated heli picnics, wine journeys, and stargazing sessions make this a bucket-list stay.

name: City Lab Lofts
shortDescription: Futuristic lofts in Hongdae with Tripolio-led K-culture experiences.
description: City Lab Lofts merges Seoul’s tech-savvy design with cultural deep dives. Unlock Tripolio’s K-pop studio sessions, market tastings, and photo ateliers with each booking.

name: Baltic Art House
shortDescription: Creative house near Tallinn’s medieval core with Tripolio artist-led programming.
description: Baltic Art House is part gallery, part slow-stay hub. Tripolio travellers get access to sauna rituals, art walks, and digital detox lounges curated by local creatives.

name: Sydney Harbour Haven
shortDescription: Circular Quay suites with Tripolio harbour adventures and culinary drops.
description: Sydney Harbour Haven overlooks the Opera House and bridges. Tripolio bookings unlock dawn kayak tours, chef-led oyster tastings, and curated gallery circuits.

name: Arctic Aurora Dome
shortDescription: Glass igloos under the Aurora with Tripolio-guided Arctic experiences.
description: Arctic Aurora Dome elevates Lapland stays with designer igloos and cultural immersion. Tripolio travelers receive reindeer safaris, ice dining experiences, and sauna rituals tailored to your itinerary.

name: Santorini Sunset Collective
shortDescription: Cliffside suites in Oia with Tripolio sunset rituals and sailing charters.
description: Santorini Sunset Collective layers Cycladic design with curated rituals. Book through Tripolio for private caldera sails, photography concierge sessions, and meditation caves at golden hour.

name: Dubai Skyline Residences
shortDescription: Skyline suites atop Downtown Dubai with Tripolio-curated desert and design tours.
description: Dubai Skyline Residences elevate luxury stays with curated desert safaris, souk personal shoppers, and in-house art tours orchestrated by Tripolio hosts.

name: Kyoto Family Ryokan
shortDescription: Family-friendly ryokan near Higashiyama with Tripolio-hosted cultural workshops.
description: Kyoto Family Ryokan blends tatami serenity with thoughtful amenities for multi-generational travel. Tripolio guests enjoy guided temple walks, tea ceremonies, and bike adventures tailored for families.

name: Lisbon Creative Studio Flats
shortDescription: Budget-savvy design studios in Alfama with Tripolio cowork credits and tram perks.
description: Lisbon Creative Studio Flats cater to digital nomads and weekend explorers. Book via Tripolio for coworking passes, curated art walks, and ready-to-use smart kitchens.

name: Mexico City Art Lofts
shortDescription: Roma Norte lofts celebrating art, food, and family-friendly workshops.
description: Mexico City Art Lofts offer cinematic rooftops and curated culinary labs. Tripolio travellers unlock mezcal tastings, kids’ mural sessions, and private gallery tours.

name: Dubrovnik Coast Cabana
shortDescription: Adriatic cabanas with Tripolio-provisioned kayaks and historic walking tours.
description: Dubrovnik Coast Cabana pairs breezy suites with Mediterranean cuisine. Tripolio bookings include boat shuttles to hidden coves and storyteller-led tours in the Old Town.

name: Cape Town Urban Backpack Suites
shortDescription: Design-led hostel suites with Tripolio adventure concierge and rooftop braais.
description: Cape Town Urban Backpack Suites prove budget can be beautiful. Tripolio travellers receive discounted adventure bundles and curated township art tours.

name: Paris Family Folie
shortDescription: Charming Parisian apartments tailored for families with Tripolio picnic kits.
description: Paris Family Folie sits steps from Canal Saint-Martin, offering stroller services, bilingual babysitters, and Tripolio-provided picnic sets for Seine-side afternoons.

name: Lagos Eco Residences
shortDescription: Eco-smart Lagos residences with Tripolio creative labs and Afrobeats nights.
description: Lagos Eco Residences celebrate West African design with solar-powered suites and community programming. Guests get Tripolio-curated Afrobeats soirées and market tours.

name: Vancouver Harbour Huts
shortDescription: Harbourfront floating cabins with Tripolio kayak tours and seaplane add-ons.
description: Vancouver Harbour Huts put you on the water with eco-minded floating cabins. Tripolio itineraries pair kayak explorations with seaplane trips over the Pacific North Coast.

name: Medina Riad Collection
shortDescription: Bohemian-chic riads in Marrakech medina with hammam rituals and rooftop breakfasts.
description: Medina Riad Collection gathers Tripolio-approved riads steps from Jemaa el-Fnaa. Expect hand-tiled courtyards, hammam spa rituals, and photographer-led souk tours.

name: Agafay Desert Lodge
shortDescription: Luxury canvas lodges in the Agafay Desert with sunsets, infinity pools, and chef-driven dining.
description: Agafay Desert Lodge delivers glamping domes with 360° horizon views. Tripolio travelers enjoy private camel treks, astrology sessions, and infinity-pool afternoons.

name: Essaouira Coast Houses
shortDescription: Design-forward coastal homes in Essaouira with surf lessons, seafood dinners, and co-working nooks.
description: Essaouira Coast Houses capture Atlantic breezes and creative energy. Tripolio guests get surf coaching, medina art walks, and communal seafood feasts.
